Lumos

Lumos is an online game service provider offering analytics, diagnostics, and common social functionality services. Studios can make informed decisions about what platforms to target, where to focus their development efforts, and help players connect with friends within their games.

Release Date: July 1, 2011

Website: www.lumospowered.com

Platforms: Web
